biotools.summary: TRAnsient Pockets in Proteins. Discovery of ligands that bind in transient subpockets in proteins. Explore the dynamics of a protein binding site and to detect pockets or sub-pockets that may transiently open due to protein internal motion.

bioschemas.name: TRAPP
